page.title: 15Transport around Paulerspury
page.content: In 1985 there are regular bus services between the village and the popular shopping centres of Milton Keynes and Northampton. United Counties buses leave Paulerspury for Milton Keynes at 10.23 and 13.03 and for Northampton at 7.35, 9.11, 12.15 and 14.20. Fourteen people were interviewed. Three of them used the bus, seven used their own car, one shared a car and three used bicycles to get out of the village. The School, the Good Neighbours and the Senior Citizens use private coach firms for their outings.
